description: Opened in 1963 Desi food inn is the finest restaurant in Karachi. Serving all kind of traditional dishes and speciality in Biryani and Nihari.
Located in Bahadurabad BBQ and grill house is the best restaurant in Karachi for BBQ and Kababs. Their BBQ platter is their seller and also grilled fish
Steak and burger cafe is the best place in Lahore for the finest most juiciest steaks. Operating for 10 years this restaurant timings are 6-11 pm.
Opened in 1970 Special Kabab house is the finest restaurant in Lahore. Serving all kind of Kababs and BBQ
Located in New-Colony Burgers and sandwiches home is the best restaurant in Islamabad for Burgers and sandwiches
Thai cuisine restaurant is the best place in Islamabad for the finest Thai food. Operating for 15 years this restaurant timings are 6 pm - 12 am.
